author: COMSOL
description: This model simulates the propagation of two frequency bands in a photonic crystal with three ports. The crystal is initially symmetric, so that the two frequency bands is directly equally to either output port. The model optimizes the position of the pillars in order to make the two frequency bands go to different output ports.
label: photonic_crystal_demultiplexer_optimization.mph
name: root
